name: Sanctuary VR
description:
Overview:
"Sanctuary VR" is a first-person puzzle solving and exploration game designed for Oculus Rift, it has a strong narrative that is fully voice acted.
The game is a seated VR experience played with a controller.


Story:
A group of refugees fled the war on earth for a new home aboard a creaking old star-ship named the "Korolev", but they never arrived at their destination.
You venture into deep space alone searching for the "Korolev" and the loved one who never arrived.

Features:
Believable and interesting puzzles (no key hunting, or page finding)
Unique setting, the "Korolev" is a unique ship worth exploring.
Strong narrative that is fully voice acted - Replay audio logs anytime while exploring, no need to stare at a menu while you listen.

Non-VR version:
A non-VR version is now included in the main package, simply select the option to play the non-VR version when prompted at startup.
